scope: Standard — code changes to worktree.ts, worktree-detect.ts, architect.md, plus new tests

reports.raw: PASS — 451 tests (4 new), all passing. Coverage good for core deduplication logic. Minor edge case suggestions (empty baseName, invalid git dir) are WARNING-level, not blocking.

PASS WITH WARNINGS — 3 findings (0 CRITICAL, 1 HIGH pre-existing, 1 MEDIUM, 1 LOW). HIGH: path traversal in worktree name (pre-existing, not introduced by this PR). MEDIUM: raw git error messages exposed. LOW: TOCTOU race. Command injection is SECURE (execFile with array args). No secrets found.

PASS (B) — 10 findings (1 CRITICAL readability, 5 SUGGESTION, 1 NITPICK, 3 PRAISE). CRITICAL: deeply nested try/catch chain (readability concern, not correctness). Suggestions: extract toast helper, named constant for magic number 10, test cleanup in afterEach. Good separation of concerns with extracted utility function.
